room_title: Escape room "Heist" by The Chamber Escape Rooms in Fort Wayne
room_address: 3225 St Joe Center Rd, Fort Wayne, IN 46835
room_description: The Declaration of Independence that was on display at the local museum has vanished. The curator has reviewed all of the CCTV footage and had everyone in the museum searched. No one has left the building. Your team of sleuths has been hired by the museum to find it. You are certain it is still inside, hidden by the thief so he can come back when the heat dies down and claim his prize. You have 60 mins until the FBI must be notified that a priceless piece of American history is missing.
